game.name: Police Detective: Tokyo Beat
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gather evidence, interview suspects and send your case to trial. Have you got what it takes to be Tokyo's top detective?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gather evidence, interview suspects and send your case to trial. Have you got what it takes to be Tokyo's top detective?
